summary: An ordinance relating ot the municipal light and power system; providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights in Sections 2, 3, 10, 11, 14, 15, 23, 26 & 35, Township 40 North, Range 43 East, W.M., in Township 39 North, Range 43 East, W.M., and in Sections 4, 5, 7, 8, 17, 18, 19 & 20, Township 38 North, Range 43 East, W.M., as a site for the boundary hydroelectric development project as authorized by license of the Federal Power Commission under Project No. 2144 (Pend Oreille River), and for access to such project area; providing for payment, and repealing Ordinance 91104 which included an incorrect description.
